newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania lowers one-week refinancing funds.
newsitem.headline: Romania lowers one-week refinancing funds.

text.p: Romania's central bank (BNR) said it had lowered the one-week refinancing funds on offer at Thursday's auction by 20 billion leu to 1.53 trillion.
It kept the one-week minimum permitted rate at 48 percent.
Traders said the money market remained inundated with leu funds which traded at 40-41 percent in short-term.
Auction results are expected later on Thursday or early on Friday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
